snippet: The purchase of nine regional mining companies by the Inner Mongolia Baotou Steel Rare Earth Group are part of a government effort to consolidate the sector.
lead_paragraph: The purchase of nine regional mining companies by the Inner Mongolia Baotou Steel Rare Earth Group are part of a government effort to consolidate the sector.

headline.main: Chinese Rare-Earths Producer Acquires Mining Firms
headline.print_headline: 9 Mining Firms Consolidates Under Chinese Producer of Rare Earths
